summary: Assistant district attorney Cleve Marshall falls for the mysterious Thelma Jordon when she seeks help solving robberies of her aunt's estate.
cast: Barbara Stanwyck|Wendell Corey|Paul Kelly|Joan Tetzel|Stanley Ridges|Richard Rober|Minor Watson|Barry Kelley|Kasey Rogers|Basil Ruysdael|Jane Novak|Gertrude Hoffman|Harry Antrim|Kate Drain Lawson|Theresa Harris|Byron Barr|Geraldine Wall|Jonathan Corey|Robin Corey|Eric Alden|Gertrude Astor|Walter Bacon|Michael Ann Barrett|Rodney Bell|Eddie Borden|Ethel Bryant|Clancy Cooper|John Cortay|Nick Cravat|Fairy Cunningham|Jim Davies|Helen Dickson|Joe Evans|Dot Farley|Franklyn Farnum|Caroline Fitzharris|Bess Flowers|Howard Gardiner|Mary Gordon|William Hamel|Sam Harris|Lew Harvey|Bill Hawes|Art Howard|Virginia Hunter|Jerry James|Stan Johnson|Geraldine Jordan|Lorna Jordon|Marjorie Kane|Dorothy Klewer|Nolan Leary|Sam McDaniel|William Meader|Walter Merrill|Ottola Nesmith|Garry Owen|Eddie Parks|Lee Phelps|Ezelle Poule|Jack Roberts|Stephen Roberts|Victor Romito|Charles Sherlock|Bert Stevens|Harry Templeton|Kenneth Tobey|Arthur Tovey|Dorothy Vernon|Lynn Whitney
title: El caso de Thelma Jordon
